skrull.game.controller
Interface IGameController

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGameController, DefaultGameController, RockPaperScissorsController, TicTacToeController
public interface IGameController

GameController should be implemented by multiple classes, specific to each game type. Client input actions flow from the server controller through this interface on to the model. In most cases the implementation will be a thin proxy to the game model.

Author:
jesse

Method Summary
